title: Pes e City rumours
content:
i had heard some rumours abt pes ecity, could someone please confirm

\> placements are pooled.

\> ecity branch and rr branch ppl are given same priority during placements.

\> e city branch is soon gonna get merged with rr branch and then the e city branch is gonna be medical university.

comments.body:
>e city branch is soon gonna get merged with rr branch and then the e city branch is gonna be medical university

This is not a rumour. I remember reading a news article regarding this pre-Covid times. I don't know if they will continue with it tho.

Cannot comment on the rest as I'm still waiting for kcet counselling to get over.
yeah same, if, thats the case there is no problem for me to join pes ecity

1, 2 - Yes. Placements happen together. Companies do not know about which campus you're from. Your degree (and any other documentation) does not contain the campus name. 

3 - I graduated this year. Around late 2019 before COVID they told us that they would be planning to do this after a few years. If not soon, maybe in another 3-4 years this could happen.
Medical buildings are not finished yet so I don't see the third one happening anytime soon(1+yrs)
Bro  is pes ec overcrowded?? And is it tough to stand out in the pes crowd?
Both campuses are crowded, but RR has way more students
Would definitely take some time though to happen though, ngl
